page.title: 03Yetholm Shops
page.content: {Town Yetholm}has the only shops in this locality, two general stores, a Post Office, a butcher and a garage. Both stores are on the Main Street, one next to the garage, delivers milk four days a week and sells health foods. The second, opposite the Plough Hotel, sells newspapers, opens seven days a week and employs part and full-time staff.The butchers, near the Plough Hotel, own a shop in Morebattle and do a village and country run. The garage sells petrol, new and second hand cars and carries out general repairs and servicing. The Post Office is in Craiglea House and is well used. The Bank of Scotland and The Royal Bank of Scotland open for half a day each week in separate houses. A fishmonger comes from Eyemouth on Thursdays and a mobile baker comes three times per week.
